# 配置文件

## 默认配置文件
```php
<?php
const ADMIN_PREFIX = "/z-admin/";

return [

    "log"=>true,

    // Theme
    "theme" => "basic",

    // Debug
    "debug" => true,

    //url
    'suffix'=>'.html',

    // i18N
    "fallback_locale"=>'zh-CN',
    "available_languages" => [],
];
```

## 数据库配置
```php
<?php 

//Automatically generated by zap cms
//Date:2023-12-20 14:57:34
return [
  'default' => 'default',
  'connections' => [
    'default' => [
      'driver' => 'sqlite',
      'dsn' => sprintf('sqlite:%s',var_path("data/zapcms.db")),
      'prefix' => 'zap_',
      'charset' => 'utf8',
      'collate' => 'utf8_general_ci',
    ],
  ],
];

```

## Log

```php
<?php

return [
    "default"=> "app",
    "app"=>[
        "handler"=> '\Monolog\Handler\RotatingFileHandler',
        "params"=>[
            'filename'=> var_path('logs/app.log')
        ]
    ]
];
```


## Cache

```php
<?php
return [
    'default'=>'file',
    'status'=>'disabled',
    'file'=>[
        'path'=>var_path('cache')
    ]
];


```
